mapper.update: update role set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, description, enabled, create_time, update_time from role
